itunes:title: #185 - Spend Less Money and Make More Time with Cait Flanders
title: #185 - Spend Less Money and Make More Time with Cait Flanders
description:
Cait Flanders, author of The Year of Less, shares how spending less money opened up more space for intentional decision-making around being a better freelancer and creative entrepreneur and living a creative life of her own making.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20

Get full show notes for this episode here
